Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item is valued at $150 by both myself and you, ensuring mutual satisfaction. Considering its high quality and functionality, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $140. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a saving of $10 compared to its original value. I trust this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $140. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $140
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
